content: {"locationId": "1897", "organizationId": "1695", "name": "Robinson Food Pantry", "address1": "602 E Pine", "address2": "", "city": "Robinson", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "62454", "country": null, "phone": "618-562-1428", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "39.003279", "longitude": "-87.7331281", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Crawford", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "1) Enter thru the double doors on the west side of the church.   2) you can visit 2 times a month.  3) You will be given a grocery cart to do your shopping, once completed your items will be placed on the roller system and taken upstairs and placed into another grocery cart for you to take to your car to unload and return the cart to the front doors.   ", "notes": "We serve West of route 1 to the Jasper County Line, North to the Clark County Line and South to the Lawrence County Line", "contactName": "Pattie Murphy", "contactPhone": "618-562-1428", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 18, "regionName": "Eastern Illinois Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "c4ca618b-3da4-4f65-b8a9-98dec847f359.png", "website": "https://www.eifoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Wednesday 9:30 AM-11:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
